participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and empathetic, enjoys connecting with others and has a passion for social issues.
participant_1.background: People do not like me too much but I like them anyways. People hate that I obsess about the poor. I like to watch people pray together. I like to make cellphone apps that would help heal our world. I like to work out at the gym to Christian electronic dance music.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Creative and community-oriented, enjoys music and is environmentally conscious.
participant_2.background: I play music in my spare time. I am committed to the environment. I live in Nashville. I like to go to the farmers market every weekend.

content.text: Hi! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the farmers market every weekend. I love trying new foods and I'm always looking for ways to support local farmers.
That's great! I love to go to the farmers market too. I love trying new foods and I think it's important to support local businesses.
Me too! I think it's important to support our local economy.
I agree! So, what's your favorite thing to get at the farmers market?
I love getting fresh fruits and vegetables. I also love getting local honey and eggs.
Me too! I love fresh produce. And I love honey!
Yeah, honey is great! I love using it in my tea and cooking.
Me too! I also love using it in my baked goods.
Oh, that's a great idea! I'll have to try that.
You should! It's delicious. So, do you have any other hobbies?
I like to play music in my spare time. I'm a musician and I love playing guitar and singing.
That's awesome! I love music too. I used to play the guitar, but I haven't played in a while.
Oh, that's too bad. You should start playing again!
I know, I know. I've been meaning to.
Well, you should! It's a lot of fun.
I will! I promise.
Great! So, what do you like to do when you're not at the farmers market or playing music?
I like to watch movies, read books, and spend time with my friends and family.
Sounds like you have a lot of interests.
I do! I like to keep busy.
Me too! I like to stay active and do things that I enjoy.
Me too! I think it's important to have a balance in life.
I agree! So, what do you like to do for work?
I'm a software engineer.
Oh, that's cool! I've always been interested in software engineering.
It's a lot of fun! I get to work on a lot of different projects and learn new things all the time.
That sounds like a great job!
It is! I love it
